text: RT @NicolleDWallace Coming up at 4 @SpeakerPelosi is our guest!

RT @AOC Now is the time to stand up for mom + pops & protect them from getting wiped out by Wall Street.

That means checking mega corps from gobbling up small biz during a global crisis. @ewarren & I have the bill.

A few bankers may cry about it, but something tells me they’ll live 🤷🏽‍♀️ https://twitter.com/ewarren/status/1255152774947495946 QT @ewarren During this crisis, the last thing we need is large companies and predatory private equity firms buying out struggling small business owners. First day of #PPP relaunch was rough. 

Delays caused by:

-Huge backlog of pending applications
